name: 9beta-pimara-7,15-diene oxidase
classes: Acting on paired donors, with incorporation or reduction of molecular oxygen;
With reduced flavin or flavoprotein as one donor, and incorporation of one atom of oxygen into the other donor
reaction: 9beta-pimara-7,15-diene + 3 O2 + 3 [reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] = 9beta-pimara-7,15-dien-19-oate + 3 [oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 4 H2O (overall reaction) [RN:R09865]; (1a) 9beta-pimara-7,15-diene + O2 + [reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] = 9beta-pimara-7,15-dien-19-ol + [oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O [RN:R09862]; (1b) 9beta-pimara-7,15-dien-19-ol + O2 + [reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] = 9beta-pimara-7,15-dien-19-al + [oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + 2 H2O [RN:R09863]; (1c) 9beta-pimara-7,15-dien-19-al + O2 + [reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] = 9beta-pimara-7,15-dien-19-oate + [oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O [RN:R09864]
comment: A cytochrome P-450 (heme-thiolate) protein. The enzyme from rice (Oryza sativa) is involved in the biosynthesis of the phytoalexin momilactone. It also acts similarly on 9beta-stemod-13(17)-ene.

references.title: CYP99A3: functional identification of a diterpene oxidase from the momilactone biosynthetic gene cluster in rice.
